porcelain.nearby_monster: You may not enter the Porcelain now, there are monsters nearby
porcelain.nearby_porcelain: You may not enter the Porcelain here, another player's Porcelain is too close
wilderness.tooltip: The Wilderness is part of the world that is marked to be reset for future Minecraft updates. Anything built in The Wilderness may eventually be lost.
arena.tooltip: Arenas are zones where PvP is encouraged. Inside an Arena, Players will accumulate Harmony from fighting each other and drop their heads upon death. Arena K/D can be viewed at the World Hall.
community.cannot_convert_harmony: You cannot mint a Charm right now
community.cannot_convert_harmony.tooltip: At least 100 Harmony and a Diamond is required to mint a Charm
community.missing_charm: You may not activate this Favor
community.missing_charm.tooltip: A Charm is required to activate a Favor
community.favor.disable_raids.tooltip: Prevents Illager Patrols from spawning and Raids from starting. Cancels ongoing Raids.
community.favor.haste.tooltip: Applies the Haste effect to all players
community.favor.jump_boost.tooltip: Applies the Jump Boost effect to all players
community.favor.keep_inventory.tooltip: Players will not drop their inventory on death
community.favor.regeneration.tooltip: Applies the Regeneration effect to all players
community.favor.resistance.tooltip: Applies the Resistance effect to all players
community.favor.fire_resistance.tooltip: Applies the Fire Resistance effect to all players
community.favor.water_breathing.tooltip: Applies the Water Breathing effect to all players
community.favor.night_vision.tooltip: Applies the Night Vision effect to all players
community.favor.speed.tooltip: Applies the Speed effect to all players
community.favor.strength.tooltip: Applies the Strength effect to all players
community.favor.clear_weather.tooltip: Stops weather from changing and clears the skies
community.favor.xp_rain.tooltip: Causes Experience orbs to rain from the sky
community.favor.horsepower.tooltip: Mounts receive Speed, Jump Boost, and Slow Falling effects while being ridden and receive the Levitation effect while looking upwards.
community.favor.disable_cramming.tooltip: Prevents entities from taking cramming damage
community.favor.disable_fall_damage.tool: Prevents players from taking fall damage
recall.cannot_procure_whistle: You cannot procure a Recall Whistle right now
recall.cannot_procure_whistle_tooltip: A Netherite Ingot is required to procure a Recall Whistle
haberdasher.cannot_fill_head: You cannot paint a head right now
haberdasher.cannot_fill_head.tooltip: One level of experience and a player or mob head are needed to paint a head
painting.shroomhearth.founder.title: Founder
painting.shroomhearth.founder.author: epolixa
painting.shroomhearth.the_raft.title: The Raft
